snippet: Der Landser said it was just offering tales of ordinary soldiers in World War II but was the subject of complaints by an American Jewish group.
abstract: German publisher Bauer Media Group announces that it will stop publishing pulp magazine Der Landser, which was accused by the Simon Wiesenthal Center of glorifying Nazi war criminals.
lead_paragraph: Der Landser said it was just offering tales of ordinary soldiers in World War II but was the subject of complaints by an American Jewish group.

headline.main: German Magazine Said to Glorify Nazis Will End
headline.print_headline: German Magazine Said to Glorify Nazis Will End

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
